data.eml:eml: Three new genera and ten new species of the subfamily Lecithocerinae (Lepidoptera, Lecithoceridae) from Cameroon, Africa, based on material collected in 1913 - 18

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Park, Kyu-Tek (2018): Three new genera and ten new species of the subfamily Lecithocerinae (Lepidoptera, Lecithoceridae) from Cameroon, Africa, based on material collected in 1913 - 18. Zootaxa 4415 (3): 561-579, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4415.3.9
